Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: In certain stages in the original game and the Unleashed Project, settings for Sonic's physics have overrides. Adjust this option according to whether you are playing the original game or the Unleashed Project to remove redundant overrides, allowing Sonic to handle more consistently. Or, set it to 'none' if you are not playing either of those (for example, a different stage mod).

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Adjust Classic Sonic's physics. The 'Modified' setting is a variation on the Generations physics that only adjusts parameters that make handling closer to Unleashed (except for certain Generations-specific settings that would sort of break otherwise), along with some other tweaks.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Adjust Modern Sonic's physics and Homing Attack button. 'Generations (Alt.)' adjusts Modern Sonic's physics from the original game in a similar way to Classic Sonic's 'Modified' setting.
Recommended for use with the Unleashed Project.
Recommended for use with the original game. This setting also addresses a glitch that can occur in Crisis City Act 2.
Use the mod's Classic Sonic physics. Handling will be similar to the original game with some differences like rolling lasting longer and the Jump Dash traveling further.
Use the original game's physics for Classic Sonic.
Use Unleashed physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Jump button.
Use Unleashed physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button.
Use altered Generations physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Jump button.
Use altered Generations physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button.
Use the original game's physics for Modern Sonic.
